commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is relatively new, the rooms are very comfortable, clean and hygienic, with automated electric toilets, electric curtains, washing machines and dryers, and robots can deliver food to the door when ordering takeaways, which is very convenient. If you bring your children together, they can roll around in the 1.8-inch large bed. The shuttle service car is also very comfortable to sit in. A very satisfying stay, I will consider it next time.
commentList.content: 酒店比較新，房間住的很舒服，乾淨衞生，自動化的電動馬桶，電動窗簾，洗衣機烘乾機，點外賣還有機器人送餐到門口，非常方便。帶孩子一起住1.8的大床孩子隨便翻滾。接送服務的車坐着也很舒服。很滿意的一次住宿，下次還會考慮。

feedbackList.content: 親愛的家人，這眼能所見的，耳能聽聞的，不是肩上梅枝，不是山中細雨，不是苦酒山河，而是您，愛您的小漢呦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear family, what our eyes can see and what our ears can hear is not the plum branches on our shoulders, the drizzle in the mountains, or the mountains and rivers of bitter wine, but you, the little man who loves you.

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very warm, the bed is very comfortable, the pillows can be hard or soft, the TV is large and supports mobile phone screencasting, the robot delivers food quickly, and the breakfast is also good. The entire hotel has a strong sense of technology, and it is recommended to stay here.
commentList.content: 房間很暖和，床很舒適，枕頭有硬的也有軟的，電視很大還支持手機投屏，機器人送餐也很快，早餐也不錯，整個酒店科技感很強，推薦入住。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，如果笑容有色彩，您就是五彩斑斕的。內裏晶瑩剔透，像晨間綠葉上的露珠，想用雙手去觸摸。但當您微笑時，就是那温暖的朝陽，讓人如沐春光，愛您的小漢呦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, if your smile has color, you are colorful. The inside is crystal clear, like dewdrops on green leaves in the morning, I want to touch it with my hands. But when you smile, it’s the warm sunrise that makes people feel like spring. I love you, little man.

commentList.translatedContent: The room facilities are new, simple and easy to use. The breakfast is simple but tastes good. The small food delivery robot is practical and cute. I am satisfied with the service details of the staff. It is a 15-minute walk from the subway station but provides a cost-effective paid transfer. The overall price/performance ratio is very high!
commentList.content: 房間設施新，簡潔好用，早餐簡單但味道妥帖，送餐小機器人實用可愛，對工作人員的服務細節滿意，離地鐵站步行15分鐘但提供划算的付費接送，總體性價比很高！

feedbackList.content: 親情能照亮人的生命，是前行道路鋪滿鮮花；它是一種堅定的信念，一種執着的本能，及時身無分文，親情依然存在，您言語對我們的支持，會讓我們走的更遠，會讓我們更有動力愛您的漢庭
feedbackList.translateContent: Family love can illuminate a person's life and pave the road ahead with flowers; it is a firm belief and a persistent instinct. Even if we are penniless, family love still exists. Your words of support for us will make us Going further will give us more motivation to love your Hanting

commentList.translatedContent:
Very satisfied, super nice, the room is very clean, the boss is very considerate, he provides transportation to the subway entrance, and breakfast is also available~ I will still choose here next time I go to Beijing🫶
Service: Very satisfied
Environment: very satisfied
Hygiene: very satisfied
Facilities: very satisfied
Delivery service: very satisfied
commentList.content:
很滿意，超級贊，房間很乾凈，老闆很貼心，管接送到地鐵口，早餐也是可以的～下次去北京還是會選擇這裏🫶
服務：很滿意
環境：很滿意
衞生：很滿意
設施：很滿意
送站服務:很滿意

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，非常感謝您在百忙之中抽出時間來分享您的入住體驗，祝您發財祝您被愛 祝您好運常在.愛您的小漢呦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you very much for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. I wish you fortune, I wish you are loved, and I wish you good luck. I love you, little man.

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very comfortable, safe, and has all the facilities. The big TV is great to watch! It is hygienic and clean, and the service is very good. There is also a pick-up service to the subway station. The breakfast is also very exquisite and delicious! In the future, if I need accommodation on a business trip, I will choose Hanting Hotel again!
commentList.content: 房間很舒適，很安全，還有的設施齊備都齊全，大電視看着很爽！衞生乾淨，服務也是非常的好，還有到地鐵站的接送服務，早餐也非常精緻，非常好吃！以後出差，有需要住宿還會選擇漢庭酒店的！

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，感謝您在百忙之中抽出時間來分享您的入住體驗，十里清風，萬里星河，您和他們一樣，都是小寶藏，愛您的小漢呦
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. Breeze ten miles away, stars thousands miles away, you are a little treasure just like them. I love you little man.

commentList.translatedContent:
Facilities: It's good, there is a laundry room on the first floor to wash and dry clothes 🙂
Hygiene: very clean
Environment: The temperature in the house is low in winter, there is no central air conditioner, and the heating is not too hot!
Service: Good service
The restaurant is much smaller than other stores, and the variety of meals is very small. No optionality! There is no bread and yogurt, only sugar tangerines with single fruit, porridge, corn porridge and eight-treasure porridge, and Ming stalls only have soup noodles and mixed noodles. I have been to so many stores, but this store is not ideal
commentList.content:
設施：還是不錯的，一樓有個洗衣房可以洗衣服和烘乾🙂
衞生：很乾凈
環境：冬天屋裡温度低，沒有中央空調，暖氣不太熱！
服務：服務不錯
餐廳比其他門店小很多，餐品種類少之又少。沒有可選性！麪包酸奶沒有，水果單一的砂糖橘，粥類玉米粥和八寶粥，明檔衹有湯麪和拌麪，去過這麼多家店，這家店不太理想

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，非常感謝您的選擇，咱們·酒店是新開業的~房間各項設施都很新哦~咱們房間的暖氣非常熱乎呢~酒店早餐以中式為主，看到您的建議我們也會增添新的早餐種類~再次向您致歉為您帶來不愉快的入住體驗！！！
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you very much for your choice, our hotel is newly opened ~ all the facilities in the room are very new ~ the heating in our room is very hot ~ the hotel breakfast is mainly Chinese, we see your suggestion New breakfast types will also be added ~ We apologize again for the unpleasant stay experience! ! !

commentList.translatedContent: The breakfast is not good at all. The buns have a strange smell. Everyone who eats them feels like vomiting. The waiter told us that they can only be served in the room. When we go down, we can see that many people are eating breakfast in the restaurant on the first floor. Why are the same customers treated differently? Already? And it’s cold when it’s delivered early, without any temperature, and it’s busy on holidays, so the quality can’t be reduced, right? Completely ignore the customer's feelings, the attitude of the waiter is very bad, the pillows are stiff when they are soft, the sanitary conditions of the room are average
commentList.content: 早餐一點都不好，包子一股怪味，吃的人都想吐，服務員跟我們説衹能送在房間吃，下去一看好多人都在一樓餐廳吃早點，為何同樣的顧客不同的對待了？而且早點送過來都是冷的，沒有任何温度，節假日忙，也不能降低質量不？完全忽視顧客的感受，服務員態度非常不好，枕頭軟枕了都落枕，房間衞生條件一般

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人，您好！非常抱歉 未能給您帶來滿意的體驗！您説的問題不存在哦~酒店早餐目前都是打包簡餐，廚師大姐為客人準備的都是新鮮的食品！酒店非常重視每一位客人入住體驗，也歡迎您再次預訂我們酒店！祝您新春快樂！
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello! We are very sorry that we could not bring you a satisfactory experience! The problem you mentioned does not exist ~ The hotel breakfast is currently a simple packed meal, and the chef prepares fresh food for the guests! The hotel attaches great importance to every guest's stay experience, and you are welcome to book our hotel again! I wish you a happy Chinese New Year!

commentList.content: 設施挺好的，環境也不錯

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，如果笑容有色彩，您就是五彩斑斕的。內裏晶瑩剔透，像晨間綠葉上的露珠，想用雙手去觸摸。但當您微笑時，就是那温暖的朝陽，讓人如沐春光，愛您的小漢呦

commentList.content: 酒店很乾凈服務很好，出行有接送，住了三天

feedbackList.content: 親親您好呀，我們要打開心內的窗，讓人間的繁花滿樹與燈火輝煌一片一片飄進您那扇明亮的窗，我們會讓您這份信任期待延續下去，愛您的漢庭呦

commentList.content: 房間很新，適合外出休閑遊

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，非常感謝您在百忙之中抽出時間來分享您的入住體驗，祝您發財祝您被愛 祝您好運常在.愛您的小漢呦
